          <title>
            <string language="hu">Galla Placidia-mauzóleum kupola, 6. század, Ravenna, mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">Cupola of mausoleum of Galla Placidia, 6th centruy, Ravenna, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kuppel von Mausoleum von Galla Placidia, 6.

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Coupole de mausolée de galla Placidia, 6ème

centruy, Ραβένα, μωσαϊκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cúpula del mausoleo del galla Placidia, 6to 
centruy, Ravena, mosaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Galla Placidia-mauzóleu kupolájának mozaikja, mely Krisztust ás a négy evangélista szimbólumát ábrázolja.</string>
            <string language="en">The mosaic of the cupola of the mausoleum of Galla Placida, which illustrates the symbol of Christ and the four evangelists</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">apostolok,  szimbólumok,  Krisztus,  mozaik,  evangélista szimbólum,  Ravenna,  </string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Mosaik der Kuppel des Mausoleum von Galla 
Placida, der das Symbol von Christ und von vier Evangelisten 
veranschaulicht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mosaïque de la coupole du mausolée du galla 
Placida, qui illustre le symbole du Christ et des quatre 
évangélistes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O mosaic da cúpula do mausoleum do Galla 
Placida, que ilustra o símbolo de Christ e dos quatro evangelists</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mosaico della cupola del mausoleum del galla 
Placida, che illustra il simbolo di Christ e dei quattro evangelists</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μωσαϊκό του θόλου του μαυσωλείου Galla 
Placida, το οποίο επεξηγεί το σύμβολο Χριστού και τέσσερις 
evangelists</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El mosaico de la cúpula del mausoleo del galla 
Placida, que ilustra el símbolo de Cristo y de los cuatro 
evangelistas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

Ravenna</string>
